SectionBody.Text: The department and office shall each deposit all moneys received from the sale of publications under s. 624.313 in the Insurance Regulatory Trust Fund for the purpose of paying costs for the preparation, printing, and delivery of the publications mentioned in s. 624.313(2), packaging and mailing costs, and banking, accounting, and incidental expenses connected with the sale and delivery of such publications. All moneys so deposited and all funds hereafter transferred to the Insurance Regulatory Trust Fund are appropriated for the uses and purposes above mentioned.
